Title: Qualcomm's new X85 modem blends AI and 5G for smarter, faster connections
Description: Qualcomm’s Snapdragon X85 is its next-gen 5G modem, set to power its new flagship chip with AI-driven features.

Title: The Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 needs apps like Photoshop to succeed — here's why
Description:
Adobe is bringing a web client and mobile version of Photoshop to Android.

Title: OPPO Find N5 vs. Google Pixel 9 Pro Fold
Description: Foldable phones and expensive, but between the OPPO Find N5 and Google Pixel 9 Pro Fold, they are two of the best you can buy.

Title: European leaders pledge to back Ukraine. And, takeaways from the Oscars
Description:
Several global leaders pledged support for Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy's efforts to stop Russia's war.
And, heartfelt speeches, a big surprise and history were made at the Oscars.

Title: Mikey Madison wins best actress Oscar: 'This is a dream come true'
Description: Mikey Madison won the best actress Oscar for "Anora," and recognized the sex worker community in her speech.

Title: See the first images of the Blue Ghost lander on the surface of the moon
Description: With the arrival of the Blue Ghost lander on the moon, the spacecraft has taken its first images from the lunar surface.

Title: Qualcomm’s next-gen ARM chip for Windows to add 50% more cores
Description: Qualcomm's next-gen Snapdragon X processor for Windows could feature up to 18-cores.

Title: How Democrats Lost Their Way on Immigration
Description: Isaac Chotiner interviews the New York Times journalist David Leonhardt about how a more conservative approach to immigration policy may be key to the Democratic Party’s hopes of regaining electoral success.

Title: Will Harvard Bend or Break?
Description:
Battles at the university over student protests, Israel and Gaza, affirmative action, D.E.I.
programs, federal funding, and pressure from the Trump Administration reveal a broader struggle in higher education.
Nathan Heller reports.

Title: Cutting a Parent Out of Your Life Isn’t Always the Right Solution
Description:
Popular culture paints going “no contact” as the best way to deal with hard family relationships.
But it’s not always the right choice

Title: Europe's new Ariane 6 heavy-lift rocket launching for 2nd time ever today: Watch live
Description: Europe's powerful new Ariane 6 rocket will fly for the second time ever today (March 3), and you can watch the action live.

Title: The Best Actress Category Gave The 2025 Oscars Its Most Shocking Upset
